head.title: School District 149 - Corona Virus Public Contact Information

meta.content: School District 149 - Corona Virus Public Contact Information

Public Health Contact Information
ILLINOIS DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH
Phone: 312-814-2793/312-814-5278 Website: http://www.dph.illinois.gov/
CENTERS FOR DISEASE CONTROL AND PREVENTION
​​​​​​​ Phone: 800-232-4636 Website: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/community/schools-childcare/guidance-for-schools.html
COOK COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH
Phone: (708)...

div.em: Current conditions as of 20 Apr 17:55 pm CDT

div.span: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 3am, then a slight chance of showers between 3am and 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 38. Breezy, with a west southwest wind 15 to 20 mph becoming north northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
Sunny, with a high near 48. Breezy, with a northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 36. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph becoming light and variable in the evening.
